description:
Grace`s Druddigon battled against Georgia`s Bisharp in the first round of the Donamite Tournament. Georgia`s Bisharp only used Metal Sound and Iron Head against Grace`s Druddigon to defeat it. Grace`s Druddigon was eliminated from Donamite tournament.
While it did use some attacks during the battle, none of the moves were actually said by Grace and cannot be confirmed.
name: Crimgan (Grace)
